titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J.Res. 59) making continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-216, by Mr. Cole.

Section 2 of theresolution provides that it shall be in order at any time from the calendar day of September 26, 2013, through the calendar day of September 29, 2013, for the Speaker to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules and that the Speaker or his designee shall consult with the Minority Leader or her designee on the designation of any matter or consideration pursuant to this section. The resolution provides that the amendment printed in the report shall be considered as adopted and the joint resolution, as amended shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 55.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 352.
Supplemental report filed by the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 113-216, Part II.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 232 - 193 (Roll no. 472).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 230 - 192 (Roll no. 473).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/18/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J.Res. 59) making continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.
